name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building and delivering high-performance applications across various industries, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in essential **DevOps** tools and practices, including **AWS**, **Terraform**, **CI/CD**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Jenkins**, and scripting with **Bash** and **PowerShell**. Strong ability to implement microservices and event-driven architectures to optimize cloud-native systems.
Possessing hands-on expertise in **Python** and MLOps, with experience in AI/ML platform development supporting predictive analytics and real-time processing. Demonstrated commitment to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Adept at fostering a **DevOps culture** to enhance collaboration and efficiency.
